content: While my passion lies in the {{backend}}, most of my hands-on experience has been as a {{full-stack developer}}, bridging logic with user experience.
I also enjoy writing clean and efficient code in {{Java}}, often exploring its elegance alongside my core development work.
Another great interest of mine is {{UX design}}, that I like to approach in a broader sense and not only through user interfaces.
I'm a {{passionate}} developer, always looking for new challenges and opportunities to learn.
Nowadays, you can find me on LinkedIn.
If you like cringe-inducing experiences, feel free to connect on there.
You can always check out my work on GitHub.
{{Click}} on a section on the left to learn more about my {{work}} and past {{experiences}}.
You can also {{navigate}} through the sections using the {{arrow keys}} or {{Vim motions}}.
